p: Infarction in the left ventricle was examine by Massoni’s trichrome staining. Neuronal degeneration (damage/death) was examined for 56 days after MI using cresyl violet (CV) and Fluoro-Jade B (F-J B) histofluorescence staining. Changes in C-Fos immunoreactivity were examined by immunohistochemistry for c-Fos.
